A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fan-fricken-tastic. Loved it. Visually stunning and very very well done. I was privledged enough to see the original trilogy as a child (I snuck into Empire with my older brother) so I've been a long time fan. Except for Episode I\, when watched back to back to back... which I did the week before this release\, the franchise paints a fantastic saga. I have no idea why fans are disrespecting this installment.
